# Icon

An _icon_ component is used to display a simple graph icon

## Basic Use

Button markup

- svg`.icon`

<snippeter>
<pre>
<svg class="icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
</pre>
</snippeter>

## Sizes

Icon sizes modifiers

- `.is-xs`
- `.is-sm`
- `.is-md`
- `.is-lg`
- `.is-xl`

<snippeter>
<pre>
<svg class="icon is-xs" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
<svg class="icon is-sm" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
<svg class="icon is-md" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
<svg class="icon is-lg" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
<svg class="icon is-xl" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
</pre>
</snippeter>

You can also change the _icon_ size by changing the CSS _font-size_ property.

<snippeter>
<pre>
<svg class="icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" style="font-size: 50px;">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
</pre>
</snippeter>

## Colors

You can simply change the _icon_ color by changing the CSS _color_ property.

<snippeter>
<pre>
<svg class="icon" viewBox="0 0 24 24" style="color: cornflowerblue;">
  <path d="M12,17.27L18.18,21L16.54,13.97L22,9.24L14.81,8.62L12,2L9.19,8.62L2,9.24L7.45,13.97L5.82,21L12,17.27Z" />
</svg>
</pre>
</snippeter>
